articles.title: Unvaccinated school staff, non-government employees in contact with students to undergo regular Covid-19 tests from Oct 1 - AsiaOne
articles.description: SINGAPORE - Teachers and school staff who have not been vaccinated against Covid-19 will undergo twice-weekly antigen rapid tests (ARTs) from Oct 1, as part of the vaccinate or regular test regime for public sector employees. This will also apply to non-gover…
